entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , North Battleford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Battleford Airport 02:44 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.7°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -19.2°C
Wind: E 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Blowing snow at times this evening and after midnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
